name.ja: <ruby>天使の聲<rt>アンジェロ・ヴァルモニカ</rt></ruby>

text.en: If this card is in your hand: You can discard 1 other card; place both this card and 1 "Demone Valmonica" from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone. During your Main Phase, if this card was Normal or Special Summoned this turn: You can banish 1 "Valmonica" Normal Spell/Trap from your GY; apply that Spell/Trap's LP gain effect when that card is activated. You can only use each monster effect of "Angelo Valmonica" once per turn.

pendulum_effect.en: While you have a Fiend Monster Card in your other Pendulum Zone, each time you gain LP, place 1 Resonance Counter on this card. Once per turn, when an opponent's monster declares an attack, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 "Valmonica" monster.
